main event: An unidentified flying object was reported over Roseville, California on 12 January 1957.
interesting points: The object changed colors from silver white to pale orange and back again., The object's size was compared to being three times that of a basketball held at arm's length., The object exhibited a zig-zag flying pattern and a rapid change in elevation., It was reported that there was no sound associated with the object., The sighting lasted approximately 6 minutes.
sighted object: an unusually large, brightly lit object in the night sky
